content:
Step onto your balcony for picturesque views of the golf course, or relax inside your suite with an air-jet tub, bedroom, two televisions, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, and living room with pull-out sofa and gas fireplace. Available bedroom options: one queen bed or one king bed. Our Willowbrook Suites are perfect for couples on a romantic getaway and only a quick drive from our Town Center. Sleeps up to four.

1 Queen Bed or 1 King Bed & 1 Sofabed
726 square feet / rate is for 2-4 people

STARTING FROM $158 PER NIGHT
* Excluding taxes, $3 per person per night Recreation Fee and 19% Service Charge.
